text:
**Hold Toy Bear** ❤️

Toy Bear takes the stage — a new event is here.
From** 23–26 September**, buy [**Toy Bears**](https://t.me/portals/market?startapp=) and collect tickets.

Each Toy Bear gives you a blue ticket.
Keep it for 3 days — it activates automatically.
Only active tickets count for the prizes.

Prizes waiting for you:
– 1 Plush Pepe
– 2 Heart Lockets
– 3 Durov’s Caps

Winners will be chosen randomly — more blue tickets means more chances to win.

__Check the event page in __[__**your profile** __](https://t.me/portals/market?startapp=)__and see how many tickets you’ve got ____❤️__
